options: I am a driver of category C1, C1E, C, CE, D1, D1E, D, or DE and wish to renew without a Professional Competence Certificate (P.E.I.) as I fall under an exception (paragraphs 3, 4, or 5 of Article 3 of p.d. 74/2008).
